com.soen.risk.model

Class RiskDomination

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.model.RiskDomination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiskDominationObservable, java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskDomination
extends java.lang.Object
implements RiskDominationObservable, java.io.Serializable

    Risk Domination

    The Class RiskDomination. The players world domination view displays: (1) the percentage of the map controlled by every player (2) the continents controlled by every player (3) the total number of armies owned by every player.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Yogesh Nimbhorkar
    See Also:
